section.title: Description
section.p: This class provides a mechanism to associate a record with multiple procedures. Rather than have the traditional "primary procedure", "secondary procedure", etc. in a record, the record will contain a zero-to-many pointer to this class, which then has a one-to-one pointer to a procedure, with a precedence property to indicate primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.

stentry.p: Provides an indication of whether the procedure is primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.
Indicates the procedure associated with this entry in the list.
